entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-02-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • ChangeSignatureCodeRefactoringProvider NullReferenceException #66694
  • IDE0200 (lambda expression can be removed) results in compile error (ConditionalAttribute) #63464
  • Wrong results from VB variable.Type.ToString #7698
    Backlog
  • Exception ex{"OperatorToken"} #4067
    Backlog
  • No classification in QuickInfo for variables of an aliased type #16353
    Backlog

Updated

  • Test plan for "collection literals" #66418
    C# 12.0
  • Codelens wrongly count multiple file-local types up from multiple files whose names are same #64592
    17.5
  • Semantic analysis does not work properly in .NET 5 iff executed in a test environment #52954
    17.6 P2
  • Add "Initialize Interactive with Project" support for projects other than .NET Framework #26934
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix MSBuildWorkspace report warnings as failure #66710
    Area-IDE
  • Tweak LSIF's MSBuild discovery logic #66709
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • Do not suggest replacing lambda with method group if the invoked mehod has `Conditional` attribute #66699
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Enable MSBuild COMM log #66708
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Properly classify aliases in quick info #66701
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Initial binding support for collection literals #66481
    Area-Compilers
  • Convert language-specific option types to records #66633
    Area-IDE
  • Add API to determine what capabilities the runtime supports #66706
    Area-Compilers
  • Support structure guides for #if directives #66702
    Area-IDE
  • Add some EE and EnC tests for primary constructors #66677
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Primary Constructors
